name: L.O.T.T.O. (Lust of the tainted Object)
description:
From A_ skewd Productions, in association with Soy Media, comes an ironic comedy about addiction. Luke Turner (Paris Drake) has recently been down on his luck. When a local cashier (Christian Ojore) tells him about a new scratch off lottery game, Luke sees an opportunit...y to improve his situation. He becomes convinced that if he buys enough tickets, he is sure to win the grand prize of $50,000. Follow his journey as his addiction leads him in a downward spiral

This film is directed, written, and produced by Lex Weska.

View Trailer: http://www.vimeo.com/8634419
